aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.desc1: I am a Web Developer focused on building modern web applications with a structured, efficient, and user-centered approach. I have a strong interest in combining programming logic, UI/UX design, and data processing to create digital solutions that are not only functional, but also intuitive and comfortable to use.
aboutMe.desc2: Throughout the development process, I am experienced in building responsive, scalable, and maintainable interfaces, as well as optimizing application performance to ensure speed and stability. I enjoy exploring new technologies and continuously improving product quality through best practices, collaboration, and ongoing evaluation.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.desc: Explore some of the best projects I've built as digital solutions, crafted with a modern, structured, and user-centered approach.

contact.title: Want To Collaborate?
contact.cta: Let's bring your digital project to life together. I'd be happy to collaborate and turn your ideas into a well-crafted digital solution. Get in touch today to discuss your goals, explore possibilities, and take the next step forward together.
